trans-unit.source: Peace Talks
trans-unit.target: Peace Talks

trans-unit.source: This turn and next turn, creatures can't attack, and players and permanents can't be the targets of spells or activated abilities.
trans-unit.target: This turn and next turn, creatures can't attack, and players and permanents can't be the targets of spells or activated abilities.

trans-unit.source: "By the tongues of a thousand serpents, this time I do not lie."\n—Ahmahz il Kin, Suq'Ata diplomat
trans-unit.target: "By the tongues of a thousand serpents, this time I do not lie."\n—Ahmahz il Kin, Suq'Ata diplomat

trans-unit.source: Ovinomancer
trans-unit.target: Ovinomancer

trans-unit.source: When Ovinomancer enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return three basic lands you control to their owner's hand. {T}, Return Ovinomancer to its owner's hand: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 0/1 green Sheep creature token.
trans-unit.target: When Ovinomancer enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return three basic lands you control to their owner's hand. {T}, Return Ovinomancer to its owner's hand: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 0/1 green Sheep creature token.

trans-unit.source: Dark Privilege
trans-unit.target: Dark Privilege

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate enchanted creature.

trans-unit.source: "As you breathe your last, understand why I accept such forbidden gifts."\n—Purraj of Urborg
trans-unit.target: "As you breathe your last, understand why I accept such forbidden gifts."\n—Purraj of Urborg

trans-unit.source: Necrosavant
trans-unit.target: Necrosavant

trans-unit.source: {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Necrosavant from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your upkeep.
trans-unit.target: {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Necrosavant from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your upkeep.

trans-unit.source: "Ah, I remember my first death."\n—Zarkuu, necrosavant

trans-unit.source: Urborg Mindsucker
trans-unit.target: Urborg Mindsucker

trans-unit.source: {B}, Sacrifice Urborg Mindsucker: Target opponent discards a card at random. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {B}, Sacrifice Urborg Mindsucker: Target opponent discards a card at random. Activate only as a sorcery.

trans-unit.source: "My pet will pick the ripe fruit from your tortured brain as if it were hanging from a vine."\n—Kaervek
trans-unit.target: "My pet will pick the ripe fruit from your tortured brain as if it were hanging from a vine."\n—Kaervek

trans-unit.source: Vampirism
trans-unit.target: Vampirism

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature When Vampirism enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control. Other creatures you control get -1/-1.
trans-unit.target: Enchant creature When Vampirism enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control. Other creatures you control get -1/-1.

trans-unit.source: Wicked Reward
trans-unit.target: Wicked Reward

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Target creature gets +4/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Target creature gets +4/+2 until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: "The blood on my hands is merely proof of my ambition."\n—Kaervek

trans-unit.source: Viashino Sandstalker
trans-unit.target: Viashino Sandstalker

trans-unit.source: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandstalker to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)
trans-unit.target: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandstalker to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

trans-unit.source: "Some believe sandstalkers to be illusions; those with scars know better."\n—*Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert*
trans-unit.target: "Some believe sandstalkers to be illusions; those with scars know better."\n—*Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert*

trans-unit.source: Bull Elephant
trans-unit.target: Bull Elephant

trans-unit.source: Four gray trees and a long, coiling snake. What am I?\n—Zhalfirin riddle

trans-unit.source: If you find yourself and a friend being chased by a king cheetah, you have but one chance: Trip your friend.\n—Suq'Ata wisdom
